abstract: A constant that represents the page down button.
overview:
## Discussion

Add gesture recognizers for [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIPress/PressType/pageDown] and [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIPress/PressType/pageUp] to navigate content in your app.

In an electronic program guide, select the item below the current one in response to [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIPress/PressType/downArrow], and display the next screen of items in response to [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIPress/PressType/pageDown]. While your content plays, change the channel when your app receives [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIPress/PressType/pageUp] or [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIPress/PressType/pageDown].

For more details on browsing multichannel content, see [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/TVServices/providing-channel-navigation].

# UIPress.PressType.pageDown

**Case**

A constant that represents the page down button.

## Declaration

```swift
case pageDown
```

## Discussion

Add gesture recognizers for [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIPress/PressType/pageDown] and [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIPress/PressType/pageUp] to navigate content in your app.

In an electronic program guide, select the item below the current one in response to [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIPress/PressType/downArrow], and display the next screen of items in response to [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIPress/PressType/pageDown]. While your content plays, change the channel when your app receives [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIPress/PressType/pageUp] or [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIPress/PressType/pageDown].

For more details on browsing multichannel content, see [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/TVServices/providing-channel-navigation].

## Navigation

- **UIPress.PressType.upArrow**: A constant that represents the up arrow button.
- **UIPress.PressType.downArrow**: A constant that represents the down arrow button.
- **UIPress.PressType.leftArrow**: A constant that represents the left arrow button.
- **UIPress.PressType.rightArrow**: A constant that represents the right arrow button.
- **UIPress.PressType.pageUp**: A constant that represents the page up button.
